event.title: Upcycling Android Workshop in Frankfurt, Germany

body.p: Keep using your phone - with updates through Free Software! Every year, 1.5 billion smartphones are manufactured worldwide - and just as many are thrown away after a short period of use when the updates expire. Together with the FSFE, the Chaos Computer Club Frankfurt invites you to an Upcycling Android workshop. It takes place at 6 pm, at the Hackquarter of the CCC-FFM, HÃ¤user Gasse 2, 60487 Frankfurt am Main.

After a short talk, we will show you how to update a smartphone with Free Software. There will be test devices to try out the whole thing yourself without any danger. During the event FFP-2 masks are mandatory. Questions? Email: weeman@frankfurt.ccc.de or doczkal@fsfe.org. Or drop by the public matrix room #public:ccc-ffm.de
